title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item differs from that displayed in a data/text item.
OB: When inputting 'new Date()' as content for three items, and saving and previewing the page, the dynamic text item displayed a different datetime format compared to the data and text items.
EB: The datetime format displayed in the dynamic text item should be the same as the format displayed in the data and text items.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a text data and a dynamic text item. 2. Set the content of all three items as 'new Date()'. 3. Save and preview the page.
